S4.T1.3.caption: Table 1. Comparison of Different Method on ALFRED. Star (*) stands for using step-by-step instruction instead of goal instruction. G.T. means ground-truth action. In the “Dataset” column, “Full” indicates the utilization of the entire training dataset, while “Part” indicates sampling from a subset of the training dataset. “P-RAG (Self-Iter.)” represents the iterative updates of P-RAG on the same group of task datasets.
